title: the (client) file or directory is corrupted and unreadable fix?
body: Cant get client to open and I can't repair the updated client. Upon opening the client from the desktop shortcut, within the file folder, or on ompatability mode i recieve this error. Trying to launch the legacy client does not work either as I am given an "update error unkown" message. Any one know how to solve this? Its been like this for weeks...

replies.body:
I have a fix... Go into the league of legends folder and then delete the file named 'LeagueClient.exe' 
I found that it was this file that was corrupted and once you delete launch the game again via 'lol.launcher.exe' and it should create a new leagueclient.exe file that isnt corrupted..
The game should work fine now
this really works cheers bruh . thanks a lot {{champion:157}}
This really works. Thanks a lot, MeGusteak.
Worked for me, thanks a lot!{{item:1051}}

> [{quoted}](name=MeGusteak,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FEdQ6Epo,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-07-15T18:02:08.826+0000)
>
> I have a fix... Go into the league of legends folder and then delete the file named 'LeagueClient.exe' 
> I found that it was this file that was corrupted and once you delete launch the game again via 'lol.launcher.exe' and it should create a new leagueclient.exe file that isnt corrupted..
> The game should work fine now

I can confirm that this method worked for me.
However, I launched lol.launcher.admin.exe instead, as lol.launcher.exe returned a Patcher kernel error (or something like that).

Note: I got an Adobe Air error after the first launch after reinstalling. It didn't appear after I relaunched it a second time through admin.exe

guys i have problem my computer it turned off with some windows problem and when i again turn on league of legends on desctop icon changed .. no logo of lol and when i try to start client and i get page with this "the file or directory is corrupted and ureadable" and i tryed to fix prob with this from comments but in my directory LeagueClient.exe don't exist xD ahah and i dont know what to do help me :3{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Same for me, i try to reinstall and same error, it's been 3 months that i can't play league because of this, pls fix!

I am having this same issue, would any one suggest??RIOT??? while launching the client . my pc restarted by mistake and now i am unable to open lol client as its blank or says  "the file or directory is corrupted and unreadable".....
this is dumb fix riot quickly pls

It sounds like this might be a bad update or install.  With the updated client, it would be necessary to [reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends), which would restore the legacy client.  You can then choose to updated the client again afterwards.  Hope that helps!
This did not work for me. When I reinstalled league, the client would not work. Any suggestions?
I am having the same problem.
i'm having the same problem, this happened to me after i've updated to the new client , had no problems initially but now after 2 days i cant open leaugue
